summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of 3D Glass Configurator new features. All 6 features verified working: Fixed Glass Preview, Door Fittings Templates (all 4 categories), Place Door Fitting, Auto-Align panel and Center Both functionality, Freeform Polygon Drawing with visual preview.

1. Fixed Glass Preview.description: Change dimensions (900x600 to 1500x2000), verify glass visual size stays same but labels change
1. Fixed Glass Preview.evidence: Glass visual size unchanged, labels updated from '900 mm' to '1500 mm' and '600 mm' to '2000 mm', price updated to ₹4,048.58

2. Door Fittings Templates.description: Click Templates button, verify all categories visible
categories_found: Quick Templates (Door Handle Hole, Hinge Cutout, Lock Cutout)
Locks: Lock - Center, Lock - Floor Level

3. Place Door Fitting.description: Click on Handle - Center template, verify hole appears on glass at correct position
3. Place Door Fitting.evidence: Toast 'Handle - Center placed!', hole (H1) visible at X=765, Y=300 (right-center), Ø35mm diameter

4. Auto-Align Panel.description: After placing cutout, verify Auto-Align panel appears with alignment buttons

5. Auto-Align Center Both.description: Place a hole off-center, click 'Center Both', verify cutout moves to glass center
5. Auto-Align Center Both.evidence: Toast 'Aligned to center', position changed from X=600,Y=550 to X=450,Y=300 (exact center of 900x600 glass)

6. Freeform Polygon Drawing.description: Click Freeform, click 4 points on glass, click Complete, verify custom polygon cutout created
6. Freeform Polygon Drawing.evidence: Toast 'Custom polygon created!', teal polygon (PG1) visible with dimensions 100×80, resize handles, rotation handle, Auto-Align panel available

6b. Polygon Visual Preview.description: While drawing, verify points (spheres) and connecting lines appear on glass
6b. Polygon Visual Preview.evidence: 4 teal spheres at clicked points, teal lines connecting them, status badge showing 'Drawing polygon... 4 points' with Cancel and Complete buttons

ui_verification.polygon_drawing_mode_indicator: PASS - Shows 'Drawing polygon... N points' with Cancel/Complete buttons
ui_verification.polygon_preview_visual: PASS - Green first point, teal other points, connecting lines

context_for_next_testing_agent: All Glass Configurator features verified working in iteration 49: Fixed Glass Preview maintains visual size while updating dimension labels, Door Fittings Templates panel shows all 4 categories (Handles, Locks, Hinges, Floor Spring), Auto-Align panel appears when cutout is selected with 7 alignment buttons, and Freeform Polygon Drawing works with visual preview (spheres and lines) during drawing. The polygon cutout (PG1) is created with teal color, resize handles, rotation handle, and full editing controls. The configurator uses Babylon.js for 3D rendering.
